An interesting forum discussion about FDA and agility.

Ken Schwaber explains that, in order to be compliant with the FDA when applying an agile method, you just have to be compliant with FDA regulations for each increment, for example updating the whole documentation set. This is obviously right, but this is much more difficult than he seems to imply: updating traceability matrices, FMEAs… is easy, but how do you revalidate the software every four weeks? Executing the automated functional tests is simple, but you have to perform the human acceptance tests (for the new features and also for the impacted features in order to ensure non-regression).
